==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|暴|雨}}

===Etymology 1===
Compound of {{compound|群|tr1=mura|t1=gather|雨|tr2=same|t2=rain|lang=ja}}. Literally rain that falls when clouds gather together.

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|むらさめ}}

# a sudden rain
#* {{RQ:Wamyō Ruijushō|1|26}}
#*: '''暴雨''' 楊氏漢語抄云、白雨、和名'''无良佐女''' [...]

* {{l|ja|村雨}}

===Etymology 2===
Compound of {{compound|速|tr1=haya|t1=fast|雨|tr2=same|t2=rain|lang=ja}}.

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|はやさめ}}

# a sudden and strong rain
